segments.text: The water gushing out of the sink is turning my stomach.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That woman standing in the mess, unaware, it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot soaking in the dirty puddle makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids climbing for cookies while everything's floodingâ€”yuck.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting, and they might fall into the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies in an open cabinet, probably getting dusty or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water streaming down the cabinets looks filthy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hate seeing food stolen like that, sneaky and wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's reaching hand just adds to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside the window, the garden is clean, unlike this slop inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could get ruined by the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just unsanitary and annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR
